  %
  % SPELL DESCRIPTION BEGIN
  You conjure up an extradimensional dwelling that has a single entrance
  on the plane from which the spell was cast. The entry point looks like a
  faint shimmering in the air that is 4 feet wide and 8 feet high.\\
  Only those you designate may enter the mansion, and the portal is shut
  and made invisible behind you when you enter. You may open it again from
  your own side at will.\\
  Once observers have passed beyond the entrance, they are in a magnificent
  foyer with numerous chambers beyond. The atmosphere is clean, fresh, and warm.

  \medskip
  You can create any floor plan you desire to the limit of the spell's
  effect. The place is furnished and contains sufficient foodstuffs to
  serve a nine-course banquet to a dozen people per caster level.

  A staff of near-transparent servants (two per caster level),
  liveried and obedient, wait upon all who enter. The servants function as
  \emph{unseen servant} spells except that they are visible and can go
  anywhere in the mansion.

  \medskip
  Since the place can be entered only through its special portal, outside
  conditions do not affect the mansion, nor do conditions inside it pass
  to the plane beyond.
  % SPELL DESCRIPTION END
  %
\end{SpellCard}
